briefTitle: The Impact of Radiotherapy on Oligometastatic Cancer
officialTitle: Stereotactic ABlative Radiotherapy (SABR) in Oligometastatic Cancer (OC): a Radiomics, Multi-omics, and Machine Learning Approach to Clinical Decision-making. The OC-SABR Multicentric Project
conditions: Metastasis, Metastatic Breast Cancer, Metastatic Prostate Cancer, Metastatic Colorectal Cancer, Metastatic Lung Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologic confirmation of primary tumor: breast, prostate, lung, colorectal.
* 18 years old or older.
* Up to five metastases located in the bone, lung, node, liver or brain.
* Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status Scale 0 or 1.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Non-melanoma skin cancer.
* Previous radiotherapy in the same anatomic location.
* Presence of vascular collagen disease.
* Pregnancy or lactation at the time of inclusion.
